dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Wind gusts up to 25 meters per second in some parts of Kazakhstan? That seems, uh, a bit extreme for April.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wind gusts up to twenty five meters per second in some parts of Kazakhstan? That seems, uh, a bit extreme for April.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Friday, April 18, Kazakhstan will experience unstable weather: several regions are expected to see precipitation in the form of rain and snow, possible icy conditions, and wind gusts up to 25 meters per second, according to Kazhydromet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's from Kazhydromet, so it's legit. And they're talking about possible icy conditions too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's from Kazhydromet, so it's legit. And they're talking about possible icy conditions too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Friday, April 18, Kazakhstan will experience unstable weather: several regions are expected to see precipitation in the form of rain and snow, possible icy conditions, and wind gusts up to 25 meters per second, according to Kazhydromet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, snow and rain in Astana? At this time of year?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, snow and rain in Astana? At this time of year?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Astana " Partly cloudy, occasional precipitation (rain, snow) in the morning and afternoon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the forecast says minus one to minus three at night there, so it's definitely cold enough.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the forecast says minus one to minus three at night there, so it's definitely cold enough.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperature: -1¦-3ÂC at night, +6¦+8ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But then Almaty's getting up to plus seventeen? That's a huge swing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then Almaty's getting up to plus seventeen? That's a huge swing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperature: +5¦+7ÂC at night, +15¦+17ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and Shymkent's even warmer—like, nineteen to twenty-one during the day. But thunderstorms at night.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and Shymkent's even warmer-like, nineteen to twenty-one during the day. But thunderstorms at night.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shymkent " Partly cloudy, rain and thunderstorm at night. Northeast wind at 8"13 m/s, gusts up to 15"20 m/s. Temperature: +8¦+10ÂC at night, +19¦+21ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then you've got Aktobe with ground frost down to minus two, but then plus twenty-one in the afternoon? That's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then you've got Aktobe with ground frost down to minus two, but then plus twenty-one in the afternoon? That's wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperature: +2¦+4ÂC at night (ground frost down to -2ÂC), +19¦+21ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's all over the place. Pavlodar and Petropavlovsk are looking rough though—gusts up to twenty-five meters per second.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's all over the place. Pavlodar and Petropavlovsk are looking rough though-gusts up to twenty-five meters per second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pavlodar " Cloudy, localized rain and snow, possible ice. Northwest wind at 15"20 m/s, gusts up to 25 m/s during the day. Petropavlovsk " Cloudy, snow at night, rain and snow during the day, possible ice. Northwest wind at 15"20 m/s, gusts up to 25 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's like, what, ninety kilometers an hour? That's serious wind.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's like, what, ninety kilometers an hour? That's serious wind.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they're both expecting possible ice, which is just nasty for driving.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're both expecting possible ice, which is just nasty for driving.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pavlodar " Cloudy, localized rain and snow, possible ice. Petropavlovsk " Cloudy, snow at night, rain and snow during the day, possible ice.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Meanwhile, Aktau and Atyrau are mostly clear and way warmer. Almost summer-like.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Meanwhile, Aktau and Atyrau are mostly clear and way warmer. Almost summer-like.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Aktau " Mostly clear, no precipitation. Atyrau " Mostly clear, no precipitation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Turkestan's got dust storms too, which is another layer of unpleasant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Turkestan's got dust storms too, which is another layer of unpleasant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Turkestan " Partly cloudy, no precipitation. Occasional dust storms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So basically, pack for every season if you're traveling across Kazakhstan on Friday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So basically, pack for every season if you're traveling across Kazakhstan on Friday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Layers upon layers, and maybe an umbrella. Or a snow shovel.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Layers upon layers, and maybe an umbrella. Or a snow shovel.
